Trial_Design.evidence: We randomized 30 patients undergoing primary TKA

Intervention.evidence: 250 or 500 mg vancomycin via IORA or 1 g via systemic administration

Objective.evidence: We assessed whether low-dose IORA vancomycin can achieve tissue concentrations equal or superior to those of systemic administration in TKA

Result_Outcome.evidence: The overall mean tissue concentration of vancomycin in subcutaneous fat was 14 μg/g in the 250-mg IORA group, 44 μg/g in the 500-mg IORA group, and 3.2 μg/g in the systemic group.

Harms.evidence: One patient in the systemic group developed red man syndrome during infusion.
